summary.para: Decribes a node within a graph of DirectML operators defined by and passed to .
The behavior of this node is defined by a DirectML operator.

member.name: DML_OPERATOR_GRAPH_NODE_DESC.Operator
member.summary: A DirectML operator defining the behavior of the node.

member.name: DML_OPERATOR_GRAPH_NODE_DESC.Name
member.summary: An optional name for the graph connection. If provided, this might be used within certain error messages emitted by the DirectML debug layer.
